description:
M104- This object has been of the best one to work because there are lot of tiny galaxies in the region and the main feature that is the faint stream and halo, i took my time to bring it out using m y techniques in PS and PI... We captured this from New Mexico USA Remote Observatory Insight from 16" dream Instrument with 16803 CCD FLI for around 10hrs in LRGB...
My instagram --https://www.instagram.com/mr_deepsky/
My website --- https://www.utkarshmishraastrophotography.com/post/messier-104-sombrero-galaxy-ultradeep-imaging
Image Credit Copyright : Utkarsh Mishra , Michael Petrasko ,  Mur Evenden - Team Insight Observatory


Technical Information 
ATEO 16" F3.7 dream scope Astrograph Newtonian Telescope  

Paramount MEII

FLI PL 16803 CCD 

Badder LRGB 

Luminance: 56 images at 300 sec (4.6 hours) 1x1 binning

RGB: 20 for each filter at 300 sec (1.6 hours each filter, 4.8 hours total RGB) Binning 1x1.
title: M104- Tidal Streams and Halo
